mapper.select: SELECT commu_keyvalue_set.id, commu_keyvalue_set.key_value keyValue, commu_keyvalue_set.key_desc keyDesc, commu_keyvalue_set.remark FROM commu_keyvalue_set INNER JOIN commu_key_set ON commu_keyvalue_set.key_id = commu_key_set.id AND commu_key_set.deleted = 'F' AND commu_key_set.key_type = #{keyType} WHERE commu_keyvalue_set.deleted = 'F' AND commu_keyvalue_set.company_id =#{companyId}
